List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void addAnnotation: (CPTAnnotation *annotation)
 Adds an annotation to the receiver.
void removeAnnotation: (CPTAnnotation *annotation)
 Removes an annotation from the receiver.
void removeAllAnnotations ()
 Removes all annotations from the receiver.

Properties

NSArray * annotations
 An array of annotations attached to this layer.

Detailed Description

An annotation host layer is a container layer for annotations.

Annotations can be added to and removed from an annotation layer.
